verses.text: Ayic ix yab'an vinhaj Is-boset yuninal vinhaj Saúl to toxo ix cham vinhaj Abner t'a Hebrón, ix te xiv vinh. Ix te somchajpaxq'ue masanil eb' yetisraelal vinh yet'oc.

Ay chavanh eb' vinh schecab' vinhaj Is-boset chi', yajal yaj eb' vinh t'a jun nhilanh eb' soldado elk'um. Ay jun vinh scuch Baana, haxo junxo vinh scuch Recab. Ha vinhaj Rimón cajan t'a Beerot t'a slak'anil b'aj tzek' smacb'en eb' yic Benjamín ay yuninal eb' vinh. (Ha eb' yinhtilal eb' anima cajan t'a Beerot chi', yinhtilal eb' vinhaj Benjamín.
Anhejto b'atnaccan eb' t'a Gitaim, tonhej comon ayek' eb' ta', icha ch'oc chonhab'il yaj eb'.)

(Ha vinhaj Jonatán yuninal vinhaj Saúl ay jun yuninal vinh cannac scuch Mefi-boset. Ha jun vinh chi', manh wach'oc yoc vinh schab'il, yujto ayic oye'anto ab'il sq'uinal vinh, ix javi yab'ixal tas ix uji t'a Jezreel to toxo ix cham vinhaj Saúl yet' vinhaj Jonatán. Yuj chi' ix cheljib'at vinh yuj jun ix tz'ilan q'uib'oc, ix b'at eb' elelal yalani. Yujto ix spil yip ix yeli, ix yactanel vinh ix, yuj chi' icha chi' ix aj yixtaxcan yoc vinh chi'.)
Axo ix aji to a vinhaj Recab yet' vinhaj Baana chi', ix b'at eb' vinh t'a spat vinhaj Is-boset ayic te ov k'ak' t'a chimk'ualil. Vaynac vinh t'a sch'at yic syik' jab'oc yip.

Axo ix stanhvumal spuertail spat vinh, van schayvi trigo ix, ix vayb'at ix. Val t'a jun rato chi', ix och lemnaj vinhaj Recab yet' vinh yuk'tac chi' b'aj vaynac vinhaj Is-boset chi', malaj junok mach ix ilani.

Ayic ix och eb' vinh t'a yol pat chi', ix yilan eb' vinh to jichanek' vinhaj Is-boset chi' svay t'a sch'at. Yuj chi' ix steccham vinh eb' vinh, ix xicanel sjolom vinh eb' vinh, ix yik'anb'at eb' vinh yet'oc. Pilan ak'val ix b'ey eb' vinh b'aj sb'at sb'eal Arabá

yic sb'at yak'an eb' vinh t'a vinhaj rey David t'a Hebrón. Ix yalan eb' vinh t'a vinh icha tik: --Mamin rey, ix quik'cot sjolom vinhaj Is-boset yuninal vinhaj Saúl, vinh ochnac ajk'olal t'ayach, snib'ejnac vinh ach smilchamoc. Palta a ticnaic ix el t'a sk'ol Jehová yic tza pacan a b'ha t'a vinhaj Saúl yet' t'a yinhtilal, xchi eb' vinh.
Ix tak'vi vinhaj rey David chi' t'a eb' vinh icha tik: --Syil Jehová, aton ix in colanel t'a masanil tas ay smay ix ja t'a vib'anh

to ayic ix javi jun vinh vinac t'a Siclag yic ix yik'ancot wach' ab'ix vinh t'ayin yalani, yuj schamel vinhaj Saúl, ix vak'an yamjoc vinh, ix vak'an miljoccham vinh. Aton spac chi' ix vak' t'a vinh yuj jun wach' ab'ix ix yik'cot chi' t'ayin.

Ocxom val t'ayex a ex tik, smoj ton val svak' spac t'ayex, yujto ix e milcham vinh vinac malaj smul yacb'an vaynac vinh t'a spat. Yuj chi' ol ex in satel t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik. Manhxa b'ak'uinh ol ex b'inaj jab'oc, xchi vinh.

Ixlajwi chi', ix schecan vinh rey chi' miljicham eb' vinh. Ix xicjiel sk'ab' eb' vinh yet' yoc yuj eb' soldado, ix q'ue locan snivanil eb' vinh b'aj ay yet'tal ha ha' t'a Hebrón chi'. Axo sjolom vinhaj Is-boset chi', ix yik'b'at eb' soldado, ix smucan eb' b'aj mucan vinhaj Abner, t'a Hebrón chi'.
